short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open images in a new window when pressing Shift + Ctrl and clicking an image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When viewing a small or unreadable image, simply press Shift + Ctrl + left click on the image, and then it will appear on a new tab. If images are not right clickable, then this will get past that and easily make it viewable on a new tab.
